root.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2
root.description: Overview Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 is a turn-based fantasy RPG based on the adventures of Tara and Cobi, with each having their own separate game. Both adventures were released for the Game Boy Color and then again for the PlayStation combined with the original Dragon Warrior Monsters. In both games, the main character is tasked with saving the Island of Greatlog after a magical plug that keeps the world afloat is knocked out. The character then takes his own group of monsters and searches for a new plug to save their home.

similar_games.game: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue/Red Rescue Team
